member.name: D3D10_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY
member.summary: Description of a vertex element in a vertex buffer in an output slot.

member.name: D3D10_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.SemanticName
member.summary: Type of output element. Possible values: "POSITION", "NORMAL", or "TEXCOORD0".

member.name: D3D10_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.SemanticIndex
member.summary: Output element's zero-based index. Should be used if, for example, you have more than one texture coordinate stored in each vertex.

member.name: D3D10_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.StartComponent
member.summary: Which component of the entry to begin writing out to. Valid values are 0 ~ 3. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2.

member.name: D3D10_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.ComponentCount
member.summary: The number of components of the entry to write out to. Valid values are 1 ~ 4. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2.

member.name: D3D10_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.OutputSlot
member.summary: The output slot that contains the vertex buffer that contains this output entry.
